name: OctopusCreateRelease
description: Create a Release in Octopus Deploy
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space (Legacy - Use version 4 of this task)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version 3 of this task has limited support for spaces. We recommend using version 4 of this task for a better experience.

inputs.name: ProjectFilter
inputs.label: Project search by name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This helps your find projects and populates the next Project dropdown with results.

inputs.name: ReleaseNumber
inputs.label: Release Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number to use for this release. You can leave this blank if the release number is calculated by Octopus.

inputs.name: Channel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: The [channel](https://g.octopushq.com/Channels) to use for the release.

inputs.name: ChangesetCommentReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Include Changeset Comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to include linked Changeset comments in Octopus Release notes.

inputs.name: WorkItemReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Include Work Items
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to include linked Work Item Titles in Octopus Release notes.

inputs.name: CustomReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Custom Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom notes appended to Octopus Release notes. This field supports markdown. To include newlines, you can use HTML linebreaks.

inputs.name: DeployToEnvironment
inputs.label: To Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy the release to this environment after creating it.

inputs.name: DeployForTenants
inputs.label: Tenant(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy the release for this comma-delimited list of tenants after creating it. Wildcard '*' will deploy to all tenants currently able to deploy to the above provided environment.

inputs.name: DeployForTenantTags
inputs.label: Tenant tag(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy the release for tenants who match these tags and are ready to deploy to the provided environment.

inputs.name: DeploymentProgress
inputs.label: Show Deployment Progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output from the deployment will appear in the log. If checked, the task will only succeed if the deployment is successful.

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to be supplied to the Octopus CLI. See the [Octopus CLI documentation](https://g.octopushq.com/OctoExeCreateRelease) for available parameters.
